q:
In Cloud Computing, you are working on the Cloud Deployment Models. Which of the following statements about the Community cloud model are correct:

  1. It is a mixture of Public and Private cloud models.
  2. It allows systems and services to be accessible by groups of organizations.
  3. It shares the infrastructure between several organizations from a specific community.
  4. It may be managed internally by organizations or by a third-party.

Which of the following statements about installing the Kubernetes system on an Ubuntu machine is correct:

  1. It is important to set up the virtual data center before setting up the Kubernetes system.
  2. In the absence of a physical or cloud infrastructure, it is important to set up the virtual data center on ProfitBricks.
  3. It is important to configure the master and node machines after the IaaS is successfully setup on a cloud.

In Docker, which of the following operations is provided by the Docker cloud:

  1. Node
  2. Application integration
  3. Continuous deployment

A web-hosting based company wants to scale up their business and reduce maintenance cost incurred towards support team. There major requirement is to scale up on-demand and scale down as and when needed. Which cloud type suits them the best:
In cloud computing, which of the following tools is used to implement the continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) processes?
Which of the following keywords are used in a Docker program?
Go cloud stacks maps to enable garbage collection in __________________ languages.
Which of the following cloud platforms supports the Go Cloud?
Which of the following development models is best suited with cloud computing architecture for distributed team and resources?
In cloud computing, which of the following enables multiple guest's Operating Systems to be run on top of a single bare-metal host?
To which among the following service does an Application Programming Interface (API) belong to?
How can cloud computing help the Developers working in everyday work set up their complex application environment to complete their tasks and increase their work efficiency ?

a.option: Cloud computing helps in decreasing the complexity in the applications
Cloud computing  allows the developers  to capture complex environments and set them up in a consistent manner
It reduces the number of manageable servers
It reduces the number of application environments to set up

q: A Saas company is allowing their users to fill out the feedback on their product by offering them exciting discount coupons so there millions of requests started hitting the servers , what should the company incorporate in order to process them all ?

a.option: Build the system according to needs by estimating the number of requests
By designing an excellent load balancing architecture
Constant monitoring and providing additional hardware during the peak time

q: What is the common concern often expressed by clients when initializing A multi-tenancy software solution compared to a single one?
Which of the below following techniques are important for creating cloud computing data centers?
What is the main network performance characteristic to keep in mind while building the data centers to avoid discomfort to users ?
Which among the below options is a common method of communication between Virtual Machines working in cloud environment ?

a.option: Using a public IP to all the instances in virtual private bridge
Using a private IP for all instances that are attached to the OS software ethernet bridge
Using a private IP to all the instances in virtual private bridge
Using a private IP for all instances that are attached to the OS software ethernet bridge

q:
Which of the below statements is true regarding the community clouds?

a)It shared the cloud tools and infrastructures across different companies in support of a specific community that has common problems

b)It provides both third party as well as their own data center if available for data storage

c)It is a combination of various cloud types

d)The participating organisations have the access to other organisation’s data if they belong to same community
The delay in the data packets while transferring between two nodes in Cloud is called
Which of the among the following is NOT a best way to design a fault tolerance in a Server?

a.option: Using UPS as a backup plan

q: To which among the following service does an Application Programming Interface (API) belong to?

If A , B , C ,D are four network storage devices from multiple different networks, and a process p groups all these devices so that it looks like a single storage device ,this kind of virtualization is called ___________ .
In cloud computing, which of the following is managed by vendor or cloud service provider in Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS)?
Which of the following functionalities of cloud computing is responsible for achieving automation of VMs or network nodes readiness?

A banking data-center had decided to move to a cloud-based architecture. They want to deny all access from outside or internet but want their customers to access banking portals over HTTPS. Which of the following models of cloud computing should be deployed to achieve the requirement?

a.option: Cloud computing doesn’t have such feature

q: What is the minimum infrastructure required for an enterprise to move from a trivial datacenter setup to a public cloud computing setup?

In cloud computing, a new company XYZ has employees working in different time zones. XYZ wants them to have access to same database and development tools from their respective time zones. Which of the following cloud models should the company use that ensures fire-walled access to their servers and enables their developers to access HTTP or HTTPs resources from the internet?
In cloud computing, the ____________________ requires the use of at least one additional authentication mechanism besides usual that uses passwords.
In cloud computing, companies may adopt _________________________ to simplify the hassles of multiple authentication across several applications.

In cloud computing, the data security can be ensured by adding an additional mode for verification for users of service besides the authentication password. This is termed as _______________________________.

In cloud computing, the ______________________ is an important factor to look for in the SaaS cloud deployment model. For this, you need to focus on how identities are federated across different components and services, and how critical data is protected from unauthorized access in the cloud.
In cloud computing, the __________________________ model allows the cloud service provider to completely own and manage the servers, storage resources, and the network infrastructure.
In cloud computing, the global cloud service providers often manage geographically dispersed data centers worldwide, which enables them to offer _______________________.
In cloud computing, if some vendor is offering some standard cloud based application via Internet, then it is called ______________________ offering.
In cloud computing, which of the following entities is managed by the cloud service provider in the Infrastructure-as-a-Service?
In cloud computing, which of the following features enables multiple users to connect to the same platform and yet have an isolated view?
In cloud computing, which of the following should be ideally managed by a service provider in Infrastructure-as-a-Service(IaaS)?

In cloud computing, a startup requires a service where VMs can be orchestrated automatically and storage is provided as per demand to run their telecom-based applications. Which of the following models is best suited to achieve the given scenario?

In cloud computing, if you are willing to open a TB sized shareable data sets for other researchers for management and analysis, then you get the desired support from the __________________________ community
In cloud computing, which of the following is managed by an end-user in a Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) model?
In cloud computing, which of the following tools is used to run multiple Operating Systems on a single hardware host?
In cloud computing, which of the following techniques is used to prepare an exact simulation of any underlying hardware?
In cloud computing, the two primary types of storage virtualization are _____________________________.

In cloud computing, if an organization is using an ________________ for authentication, it can rely on the third-party services for application authentication, without having to manage its own independent authentication system.

In cloud computing, if your organization is storing, processing, and transmitting more than 300,000 credit card or transactions annually, and if you are moving to cloud, you need to make sure that your cloud service provider must be ______________________ compliant.

a.option: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)

q:
Choose the correct option from the following regarding Iaas

a)It has virtual machines with software preinstalled

b)Scaling can be increased or decreased easily

c)Snapshot of the data cannot be done hence increases the security

d)Softwares in Virtual machines are generally open sourced ones

In cloud computing, all services acts as a black box and the inside business logic is not exposed to the customers in a Service Oriented Architecture based system. This is known as ______________________.

In cloud computing, the situation when a cloud-based service is besieged with a large number of fake (artificially-created) service requests due to which it is not able to take up genuine service requests from customers is known as _____________________.
In cloud computing, how do you measure the quality of the cloud-based service offerings (QoS)?

a.option: In terms of the complexity of the licensing terms from vendor.
In terms of supported bandwidth for accessing cloud environment.
In terms of the Service Level Agreements (SLAs) defined by the provider
In terms of training and support provided by the vendor.

q: In cloud computing, you should _____________________ to restrict the confidentiality of your cloud-hosted data.

a.option: Restrict the access to your information
Limit the resources availability to that dataset
Keep a local copy of your data

q: In cloud computing, a federal police department requires all its officers to login and logout via Single Sign-on (SSO) procedure for a day in-and-out attendance and accessing sensitive information. Which of the following cloud services should they ideally use to maintain secure access throughout the state?
________ is a technical specification used to define a multicast discovery on Local Area Networks.
What is a Hypervisor in Cloud Computing?
What forms the front end of a cloud computing environment from an end user's perspective?

An IT company wants to switch to a model that will allow them to have complete control over networking nodes and firewalls without the hassle of provisioning new VMs and hardware. Which of the following models of cloud computing should they choose?

In cloud computing, when using __________________, a product of the OASIS Security Services Technical Committee, the service provider should pass a set of statements or assertions to the identity provider for evaluation.

In cloud computing, if your organization is looking forward to move some of its IT budget from capital expenditure to operational expenditure, your best option would be __________________________________.

In cloud computing, __________________ refers to the system architecture where a single instance of software or hardware is used to run multiple applications, serving multiple groups of users (tenants), each having different set of privileges.
In cloud computing, to use Amazon EC2, you can use a pre-configured _________________________, which can have applications, libraries, data, and configurations settings already configured.
Which of the following applications are managed by the Kubernetes system?
In cloud computing, which of the following statements about CI/CD pipelines is correct?

a.option: It is used to isolate and secure the CI/CD environment.
It is used to make the CI/CD pipeline the only way to deploy to production.
It runs tests locally before committing to the CI/CD pipeline.

q: Which of the following is a component of the Docker program?

A mobile customer service company has an online chat system where the client and the assist will chat online and therefore answer their queries in a collaborative way , during the holidays the number of requests are huge and the company was able minimize or maximize the system resources accordingly to reduce the billing cost. What kind of cloud computing billing model is this company using?

Suppose a company like Gogrid or AWS wants to provide a new server capacity from different interface technologies to the users . Which of the below following web technologies is the most suitable to build the interface that users can leverage?

a.option: The company which use  their own HTTP REST API
The company which use  the Third party API
The company which use proprietary remote API.
The company which use the XML RPC  service

q: Which among the below following is the easiest way to create a password authentication in servers ?

In cloud computing, to ensure _________________________, you should check for encryption related facilities, data ownership related norms of the vendor, backup archival and purging mechanisms, and if required, physical location of the data center storing your data.
In cloud computing, for any small-sized organization (less than 50 people), the most cost-effective cloud deployment option is __________________________.
The key challenge in the adoption of cloud computing is usually ________.
In cloud computing, the _________________ technique helps in distribution of the service requests across available resources.
In cloud computing, which of the following technologies is the best in terms of cost and time for a hassle-free, geographically-redundant, and on-demand storage needs?

a.option: Manual daily backups at each location

q: In cloud computing, if a system administrator plans to use SNAT based IP allocation to instances in virtualization fabric, then which of the following service types is recommended?
In cloud computing, which of the following is not a valid cloud deployment model?
In cloud computing, which of the following is correct statement regarding data storage in a cloud environment?

a.option: Data stored in cloud is always automatically encrypted.
Data stored in cloud automatically follows Row Level Security rules.
Data stored in the cloud is automatically stored redundantly to ensure availability.
Data stored in cloud automatically gets fail over clustering.

q: An event based organization is using AWS to host data and applications for its new singing contest. Users are required to upload their audio recordings to the application, which is then stored on the S3. But organization is also aware about security risks of saving the user credentials on same S3 machine. What is the best option to deal with this?

a.option: Use two different S3 subscriptions to hold data and credentials separately
Use AWS Identity and Access Management to control the access
Use an EC2 instance to store credentials, and link it to S3
Use a third party Single Sign-On hosted within its local premises

q: Bob is working on the functionality of various cloud deployment models from Cloud Computing. If he is required to allow his organization to store its data within its campus for an internal application and to interconnect that application to another business intelligence application that is available on a public cloud, then which of the following cloud deployment model can he implement in this scenario to perform this action?

Which of the following statements about the Kubernetes system is correct:

  1. It is a loosely-coupled infrastructure where each component acts as a separate unit.
  2. It has a higher density of resource utilization.
  3. It is used for the development of products but does not support the integration and deployment of the same.
In Docker, which of the following syntaxes is used to delete a container?
In Go, which of the following statements about the cloud-specific setup code is correct?

a.option: Go cloud automates the code with a tool known as Wire.

q: which of the among the following cloud computing feature allows for server action resulting in decreased data center energy needs?
Which of the below following services provide an environment to deploy web and mobile applications ?
A cloud computing model that uses utility-styled costing or pay-per-use model based on up-time of resource and bandwidth use is ___________________________.

In cloud computing, a new company XYZ has employees working in different time zones. XYZ wants them to have access to same database and development tools from their respective time zones. Answer the following question as a system administrator of the company. Which of the following technologies should XYZ use to meet the requirement?
In cloud computing, which of the following virtual-appliance units serves as the basic unit of service deployment and can be used to create virtual machines on the Amazon EC2 cloud?
In cloud computig, a Customer Relations Management ( CRM ) service available in cloud is an example of _________________________.

In cloud computing, an important part of cloud migration planning is ________________________. In this, you should have plan for a rollback, and be aware about steps for moving all your applications back to original state, or to some other cloud service

The cloud computing service model that allows developers of a same product development team to authorize, authenticate, and access their personal resources remotely anytime, anywhere in the world is _____________________________________.
In cloud computing, when migrating to cloud environment, the risk related to __________________ is increased.

In cloud computing, few cloud vendors offer ___________________. For this, they provide options for transparency, compliance controls, auditability, and options to control the physical location of data centers where your data resides.

In Cloud-Computing, ___________________ refers to a standard procedure for requesting services from distributed application components and managing the results independently, irrespective of vendors, products and technologies.

Which of the following Docker commands are used to perform the following tasks:

Tasks

  1. Remove one or more images
  2. Remove one or more containers
  3. List out all the images with their repositories and sizes

Commands

  1. 1. docker image rmie
2. docker rm
3. docker image images

     

  2. 1. docker image rmi
2. docker image rm
3. docker images
  3. 1. docker image rm
2. docker rm
3. docker images

     

  4. 1. docker image rm
2. docker rm
3. docker image images

Which of the following statements about the Docker program is correct:

  1. It has the ability to reduce the size of development by providing a smaller footprint of the operating system via containers
  2. Its containers can be deployed on physical machines, virtual machines, and the cloud.
  3. Its containers are lightweight in nature, and therefore, are easily scalable.

In Kubernetes, which of the following statements correctly explains the client-server architecture:

  1. The master and node are installed on the same machine.
  2. The master is installed on one machine and the node is installed on a different Linux machine.
  3. The master and node are installed on different Linux machines.
In Kubernetes, which of the following is a component of the master machine?

A company ABC needs a data center with 1000 servers at a minimum cost of maintenance. Servers should be available 24 hours per day and redundancy is the key. Which of the following is used to achieve this requirement at the cheapest possible cost?

a.option: Hiring a third party company to manage data centers
Setting up servers in a cloud-ready data center

q: End users can achieve the higher level of governance through uninterrupted access to their resources at any time with no failures as well. Which of the following models of cloud computing provides maximum governance?
In cloud computing, the ControlCase PCI and similar services dealing with regulatory policies as a service on cloud are examples of the ________________________.

In cloud computing, before adopting _____________________ as a service-based cloud deployment model for any organization, the impact should be discussed with the IT team first, as they will manage the software patches, maintenance, and upgrades.
Which of the following is not a typical characteristic of cloud computing?

In cloud computing, to ensure ____________________ related norms, you should check the cloud vendor's certifications, liabilities towards dispute resolution, cloud monitoring metrics adopted by him, whether he offers e-discovery, criminal check facilities and so on.

In cloud computing, ______________________ is an open standard to store and distribute the system images that can run in virtual images.
A telecom company requires fatter CPU, bandwidth, multiple traffic types, and VLANs to deliver high performance. Which cloud computing service model is best suited for their use case:
In cloud computing, which of the following models enables end-to-end communication?
In cloud computing, which of the following is an attribute-based authorization markup languages for policy control?
In cloud computing, which of the following events have a drastic impact on an organization if it entirely runs on a public cloud?

a.option: Discovery of a new virus targeting Linux operating systems
Cloud vendor's email server going down for 2 hours

q: In cloud computing, the _______________________ runs as a normal application on a single operating system and supports a single process. Its lifespan is limited to the process bound with it.
In cloud computing, the _________________ enables each Web Service to be aware of the business process, including the other clients and components interactions.
Which among the following is the key Characteristic feature of Application Binary Interface emulation?

a.option: It can be used to create an environment to execute unknown programs
It uses Virtual Machine to run the operation
It does not use any external API’s hence increases security

q: In cloud computing, which of the following is responsible for Authentication services, Registration, and Directory services?

An ISP wants to move reap benefits of cloud computing by placing their content-caching server on the cloud but do not want it to be accessible over the internet but on LAN. Which of the following models of cloud computing should be used?
